creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Table cover, embroidered with solid ground of orange silk floss. Design of peony flowers, leaves and bats in satin stitch in shades of blue and green; numerous longevity symbols in couched gold threads. Border of solid black floss ground with bats in blue and longevity symbols in couched gold threads. Lining of blue cotton.
title: Table cover
